text: Ya'akov Nehoshtan (; 22 April 1925 â€“ 17 April 2019) was an Israeli politician, diplomat and lawyer. He served as a member of the Knesset for Gahal between 1969 and 1974. He also served as Israeli Ambassador to the Netherlands between 1982 and 1985. Nehoshtan was born in Kazanlak, Bulgaria. He fled to Mandatory Palestine in 1944. His son, Ido, served as commander of the Israeli Air Force. Nehoshtan died on 17 April 2019, at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ya'akov Nehoshtan on the Knesset website Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Israel Category:Bulgarian Jews Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Israeli lawyers Category:Jewish Israeli politicians
title: Ya'akov Nehoshtan
